1995984 THE WAREHOUSING CORPORATIONS (AMENDMENT) ACT, 2005
NO. 45 OF 2005 [ 15th September, 2005.]
An Act further to amend the Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- sixth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
115199 1 Short title and commencement.-
729334 1This Act may be called the Warehousing Corporations (Amendment) Act, 2005.
1770441 2It shall come into force on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1367394 2 Amendment of section 7.- In section 7 of the Warehousing Corporations Act, 1962 (58 of 1962) (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act),-
1106235 ain sub- section (1),-
225972 iclause (b) shall be omitted;
173294 iiafter clause (f), the following clause shall be inserted, namely:- " (ff) three directors to be appointed by the Central Government;";
982203 bin sub- section (4), the words" and a Vice- Chairman" shall be omitted;
1856386 cafter sub- section (4), the following sub- section shall be inserted, namely:- " (4A) The directors appointed under clause (ff) of sub- section (1) shall be entitled to receive such salary and allowances as the Central Warehousing Corporation may, with the approval of the Central Government, determine.".
667126 3 Amendment of section 8.- In section 8 of the principal Act, in clause (v), for the words" the managing director", the words, brackets, letters and figures" the directors appointed under clause (ff) of sub- section
297947 1of section 7 and the managing director" shall be substituted.
1939557 4 Amendment of section 12.- In section 12 of the principal Act,-
22671 ain sub- section (1), in clause (a), the words" and the Vice- Chairman" shall be omitted;
840322 bfor sub- section (2), the following sub- section shall be substituted, namely:- " (2) The Chairman of the board of directors shall be the Chairman of the Executive Committee.".
638581 5Amendment of section 27.- In section 27 of the principal Act, in sub- section (2), in clause (iii), for the words" nationalised bank", the words" scheduled bank" shall be substituted. ----
T. K. VISWANATHAN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
